description: React component for a single todo item, supporting toggle, inline editing, and delete actions with accessibility features.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Handles saving the edited task title, updating parent component if changed.

methods.name: cancel
methods.description: Cancels editing and resets draft to original title.

methods.name: onKeyDown
methods.description: Handles key events for saving on Enter or cancelling on Escape.
